short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A plugin to sync video playback.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
这个插件可以帮助多个用户同步视频播放进度，带来更加流畅的观影体验。

使用方法：

不同用户分别打开相同的视频网站。
输入相同的房间号并点击“连接”。
拖动视频进度条、播放或暂停时，所有连接的设备将自动同步。
请注意，插件仍在开发过程中。如果遇到任何问题或需要改进的地方，请耐心等待后续更新。

This plugin helps multiple users synchronize video playback, providing a smoother and more immersive viewing experience.

How to Use:

Users open the same video website on their devices.
Enter the same room ID and click "Connect".
Any changes, such as dragging the video timeline, play, or pause, will automatically synchronize across all connected devices.
Please note that this plugin is still under development. If you encounter any bugs or areas for improvement, kindly be patient as updates are on the way.
